name: math-power
description: Web app for AWS experimenting via simple math operations

scripts.watch: ECHO.Watching from latest build... && pause && tsc --build --watch
scripts.build: ECHO.Starting new build... && npm run clean && tsc && npm run copycss && npm test && ECHO.Build passed tests.
scripts.start: ECHO.Starting browser with latest build... && npm run preview
scripts._publish_git_commands_: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout -
scripts.publish: ECHO.Publishing latest build... && npm test && npm run gh . && git checkout - && ECHO.DONE.

author: Darren Semotiuk
